description: Fabrizio Silvestri Website | ICL-PRO Technical and Developer
keywords: web developer, web designer, computer, technology, website
title: Silvestri Fabrizio | Developer
knowledgeSubtitle: What I learned in my studies

knowledges.title: Database
knowledges.body: Design and maintenance of SQL Database (MySQL and PostgreSQL) and basic knowledge of NoSQL Database (MongoDB).

knowledges.title: Web Application
knowledges.body: I have a very good knowledge of programming languages such as HTML5, CSS3, JS and PHP.

knowledges.title: App Android
knowledges.body: Project and development of android applications with care for design and user experience.

knowledges.title: C# e Java
knowledges.body: Good level of object-oriented programming and knowledge of Eclipse and Visual Studio IDE.

knowledges.title: Testing
knowledges.body: I test my software via Framework (JUnit, NUnit).

knowledges.title: Versioning
knowledges.body: Excellent knowledge of the GIT terminal commands and of GitHub portal.

projects.title: EventAround
projects.subtitle: Websito to find events.
projects.description:
Developed for a university project. The application allows you to search on a map events entered by users using search filters.
Each user can add new events and manage them, report their interest in other events and view the profiles of other users.
The project also contains a part reserved for administrators to help manage the platform.

projects.title: EventAround App
projects.subtitle: Android App to find events.
projects.description:
Application that incorporates the functionality of the previously developed EventAround site.
It allows you to search for events and add them to the system. It also has the functionality of notifying the presence of affected events and other features.
projects.for: Course: Algorithm Design and Analysis Laboratory - UNIGE

projects.title: Rocco Parisi
projects.subtitle: Site of the musician Rocco Parisi.
projects.description: Dynamic site that allows you to view all the new activities of the musician updated through an administrative area.

projects.title: A.S.D.I. Liguria
projects.subtitle: Site for O.N.L.U.S. Association
projects.description: Update of the A.S.D.I. Liguria website implementing a responsive design and greater fluidity in the nanvigation in order to immediately obtain the main information. Developed using Bootstrap animations and graphics.

projects.title: Library for Travel Agency
projects.subtitle: Advance Programming Technical Project
projects.description:
The project is a toy solution to the problem of planning trips between cities, and consists of two related components:
  • The Travel Company Component, which is used to manage confederations of Travel Companies, where any Travel Company is a provider of point-to-point legs;
  • The Planner Component, which uses Travel Companies to plan a multi-hops trips between cities.

      • Through this project I became familiar with the C # language and Test Driven Development programming.

trainingSubtitle: My name is Fabrizio Silvestri and I was born in Genoa on May 1993.

stages.title: Diploma Superiori
stages.description: Mi sono diplomato all'ITIS I. Calvino di Genova, indirizzo Scientifico Tecnologico. Lo stesso anno mi sono iscritto ad Ingegneria Informatica.

stages.title: Iscrizione Scienze Informatiche
stages.description: Ho riconosciuto che ingegneria non era la strada corretta per me e ho deciso di iscrivermi al corso di Laurea in Informatica sempre presso l'Università degli Studi di Genova.

stages.title: Corso ICL-PRO
stages.description: Ho seguito un corso presso l'Istituto Gamma di Milano ottenendo la certificazione ICL-PRO Technical Specialist. Ho maturato così le competenze da Tecnico Informatico.

stages.title: Internship with IFM Group
stages.description: I have done a internship with IFM Group where I have develop a Web Dashboard to visualize users data. I done experience with Angular 5 framework and this is the main argument of my thesis.

stages.title: Computer Science degree
stages.description: I plan to complete my studies in July of 2018.

name: Fabrizio
aboutMe:
Currently I do computer support, design and development of websites of varying complexity, desktop and mobile applications mainly to test the knowledge that my studies have provided me.
I see each new project as a personal challenge in which I commit myself to grow further my skills.
contactSubtitle: I will answer you as soon as possible.
